notes.text:
Philosopher René Descartes once stated, “I don’t think, therefore I am a Sylvan player”. 

In order to counteract against the slew of 500 IQ Sylvan players who always successfully pressed the “yes” button with meticulous precision and extreme accuracy, I had to bring something that could tilt the odd in my favor. You may think this is a typical netdecked Geargia deck, but hoo boy, you’re wrong in so many aspects. It’s a 21 card deck, meaning it’s the pinnacle of originality and perfection.
